name: manageb2capp
description: Manages an app registration in a B2C tenant.
author: DarkLoop

inputs.label: Azure AD B2C Connection
inputs.name: b2cTenantConnection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection to the Azure AD B2C tenant. [How to setup your service connection](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=darkloop.b2c-tasks#create-a-connection-to-your-b2c-tenant).

inputs.label: Application name
inputs.name: appName
inputs.helpMarkDown: The display name for the application in the directory.

inputs.label: Create app with compatibility for
inputs.name: compatibility
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Allows you to select the kind of application that needs to be registered in the tenant.
Use `Azure AD` for tenant management activities, use `Azure AD B2C` for consumer applications.
This setting is used when creating the application only, once created changing this setting will not affect the existing application.

inputs.label: Application is a native client
inputs.name: isNativeApp
inputs.helpMarkDown: Used when targeting a native desktop or mobile application in order to enable native authentication protocols such ROPC.

inputs.label: Reply URIs
inputs.name: webReplyUris
inputs.helpMarkDown: The line separated redirect URIs to be used for the user flows.

inputs.label: Logout URI
inputs.name: webLogoutUri
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Logout URI used by web clients to remove user session.

inputs.label: Allow implicit flow ID tokens
inputs.name: webImplicitIdTokens
inputs.helpMarkDown: Allows issuing ID tokens for a client on behalf of the user.

inputs.label: Allow implicit flow access tokens
inputs.name: webImplicitAccessTokens
inputs.helpMarkDown: Allows issuing access tokens for a client on behalf of the user.

inputs.label: Custom redirect URIs
inputs.name: mobdeskRedirectUris
inputs.helpMarkDown: The custom redirect URIs to be used by the application when requesting tokens.

inputs.label: Enable MSAL redirect URI
inputs.name: deskMobMsalEnabled
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicate if the 'msal{app-id}://auth' redirect URI should be configured.

inputs.label: Enable native redirect URI
inputs.name: deskMobNativeEnabled
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicate if the native redirect URI should be configured (https://{tenant-name}.b2clogin.com/oauth2/nativeclient).

inputs.label: Bundle IDs
inputs.name: iosBundleIds
inputs.helpMarkDown: Line separated list of bundle IDs that can be found in XCode in the Info.plist or `Build Settings`.

inputs.label: Package name/Signature Hash pairs
inputs.name: androidPackHash
inputs.helpMarkDown: Line separated pairs of package name/hash `{package-name}:{base64-encoded-signature-hash}`.

inputs.label: Permissions
inputs.name: apiPermissions
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Line separated list of permissions for the application in the format: `{api-name}|{permission-name}|{type}`
**`type`** can be `delegated` or `application`.

inputs.label: Application API URI
inputs.name: appApiUri
inputs.helpMarkDown: Globally unique URI to identify the API

inputs.label: Scopes
inputs.name: exposedScopes
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Line separated list of scopes defined by this API in the format:
`{scope-name}|{admin-consent-name}|{admin-consent-description}|[{state}]`
**`State`** can be `enabled` or `disabled`; default value is `enabled`. This determines whether this scope is available for clients to request. Set it to “Disabled” for scopes that you do not want to be visible to clients. Only disabled scopes can be deleted, and we recommend waiting at least a week after a scope has been disabled before deleting it to ensure no clients are still using it.

inputs.label: Application Client ID variable
inputs.name: appClientIdVariable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable to assign the application's `Client ID`.
